headers.subject: [tosdr:1712] [Bad] Spotify has a broad copyright license

html:
You grant perpetual license to use anything you publish. While the global license expires when you unsubscribe, public content will 
remain licensed and will not be deleted.

You grant us a non-exclusive, transferable, sub-licensable, royalty-free, worldwide license to use any User Content that you post on or in connection with Spotify. This license lasts until you terminate your Spotify account, except in the case of User Content that you have published, made public and/or share with others.

https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/end-user-agreement/ 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
